sense.def:
Kadar je človek
keen to do something
, si tisto močno želi storiti.

seg.quote: Her solicitor was keener to talk than she was.
He didn't seem all that keen on having it.
He's not keen for Charlotte to know.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
keen
povemo, da nekdo uživa ob določenem športu ali dejavnosti in se temu veliko posveča.

seg.quote: He was not a keen gardener.
Boys are as keen on cooking as girls are.

sense.def:
Kdor je
keen
, vse počne z veseljem in zanimanjem.

seg.quote: They were highly-motivated students, very keen.

sense.def:
To have a keen interest or desire
pomeni, da sta naše zanimanje ali želja zelo močna.

seg.quote: He took a keen interest in domestic affairs.
I was keenly interested in outdoor activities.

sense.def:
To have keen sight or hearing
pomeni dobro videti ali slišati.

seg.quote: It takes a keen eye to spot them.

sense.def:
Na natečaju ali tekmovanju, ki je
keen
, si sodelujoči zelo močno prizadevajo za zmago.

seg.quote: The competition for the first prize was keen.
